The goal of mortgage_forecasts is to make a miniaml example to build a Python package. I learn it from @Albert_DeFusco2019.
The sample data is downloaded from @MORTGAGE30US.

## Installation

The development version from [Anaconda Cloud](https://anaconda.org/JiaxiangBU/mortgage_forecasts) with:

```conda
conda install -c jiaxiangbu mortgage_forecasts 
```

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```conda
pip install git+https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/mortgage_forecasts
```
